snippet: A defiant Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez said he would not resign from the Legislature over multiple sexual harassment allegations.
abstract: Defiant Assemblyman Vito J Lopez, once-powerful head of the Brooklyn Democratic Party, announces his refusal to resign from the New York State Legislature over multiple sexual harassment allegations; statement comes even as elected officials begin to debate whether to seek Lopez's expulsion, and the state ethics commission meets to discuss an investigation.

byline.original: By DANNY HAKIM and THOMAS KAPLAN

lead_paragraph: A defiant Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez said he would not resign from the Legislature over multiple sexual harassment allegations.

headline.seo: Assemblyman Lopez Says He Won’t Quit in Wake of Sexual Harassment Scandal
headline.main: Legislators Debate Expulsion in Sexual Harassment Case; Lopez Vows to Remain
headline.print_headline: Legislators Debate Expulsion in Sexual Harassment Case; Lopez Vows to Remain
